name: Robo Vacuum Simulator
description:
Summary

Play as a cleaning robot, as you vacuum a variety of unique environments. Whilst listening to a relaxing soundtrack, in this fun and casual simulator.

Gameplay

'Robo Vacuum Simulator' is a relaxing game in which you immerse yourself as a cleaning robot. You will vacuum a variety of environments, including houses, hospitals, office spaces, garages, attics(who puts a cleaning robot in the attic?) and more...

Levels

Vacuum rubbish in unique environments:



Features

  • Find and vacuum up rubbish

  • Remember to recharge at the charging dock when low on battery

  • Return to the charging dock when all rubbish is vacuumed.
